I say America has the strictest gun control laws. 
 Why? 
 Simple, America has a right protecting the right to bear arms. Yet America has over 20,000 gun control laws limiting this right. 
 
 If you are going to use other countries laws to defend you claims please provide the necessary documentation to defend your claim.
